QuestData.Title: Just a Few More Things...
QuestData.Description: As you may have noticed, we created the airstrip on the southern border of a magnataur den!$B$B<Crafty says something uncharitable about Fizzcrank under her breath.>$B$BThe old man has put me in charge of finding a... ahem... creative solution to this situation: if we don't deal with them soon, they'll come down here and tear us limb from limb!$B$BThat's where you come in. I want you to get me everything on this shopping list. Please.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Crafty's Tools, an Overcharged Capacitor, and a Handful of Rocknar's Grit. Deliver them to Crafty Wobblesprocket at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestData.CompletionText: Why is it that I don't believe you've collected everything on my list?
QuestData.RewardText: Alright, that's more like it! Now all we gots to do is put all this together.$B$BYeah, as if you're going to help me with that.$B$BHold your horses, this'll just take a second now that I've got my tools back!
